name: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing III
summary: The third installment builds upon the story of the first two games. Taking place after the Civil War in Borgovia, "a strange cult prophesizes the coming of 'The end of times.'" With all the strange things occurring in the world of Van Helsing, they just might be onto something. Gameplay-wise, it contains new items, improved leveling and customization and more. It will once again have cooperative online play.
